text: The Samsung Galaxy S22 series was released in February 2022. ==Display== The S22, S22+ and S22 Ultra have 6.1", 6.7" and 6.8" display respectively. They all use AMOLED. ==Cameras== The S22 and S22+ both use a 50 MP rear camera with 12 MP ultrawide and 64 MP 3x telephoto lens. The S22 Ultra uses a 108 MP rear camera with 12 MP ultrawide, 10 MP 3x telephoto and 10 MP 10x telephoto lens. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2022 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Samsung Galaxy
title: Samsung Galaxy S22
